entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mackenzie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:53 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, -10.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mackenzie Airport 07:57 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: -10.6°C
Pressure: 102.6 kPa
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: -11.7°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning. A few flurries beginning this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning then becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
